DataElement.preferredName: Sex Behavior Quality of Life Erection Maintenance Past Integer::6 Month Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric entry to describe a man's assessment of how often he is able to maintain an erection after penetration of his partner.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sex Behavior Quality of Life Erection Maintenance Past Integer::6 Month Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related the evaluation of the difficulty of maintaining an erection, the hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male, following penetration and during physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else as part of the subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part.::6_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse. (from Wikipedia):The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Concepts.definition: Behaviors involved with sexual arousal and/or intercourse.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Property.preferredName: Erection Maintenance Past Integer::6 Month Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: Erection is the hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.:The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.:Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part.::6:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.
The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ReferenceDocuments.name: During sexual intercourse, ho
ReferenceDocuments.description: During sexual intercourse, how often were you able to maintain your erection afte you had penetrated (entered) your partner?

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for NCI CCR trial.  The SHIM is a tool to assess ED (Erectile Dysfunction) in males, and is based on a past six months assessment.
